creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: lined hat with overall cross stitch embroidery with large red pompom and two tassels; red, green, blue, yellow and brown; 4" loop of thread attached to back

title: Baby hat
